subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Adrian Gonzalez, whom Boston Red Sox Manager Terry Francona calls the best hitter in baseball, is atop the majors in batting average (.352), runs batted in (71) and total bases (194).
snippet: Adrian Gonzalez, whom Boston Red Sox Manager Terry Francona calls the best hitter in baseball, is atop the majors in batting average (.352), runs batted in (71) and total bases (194).
